sentences.en: a stepping stone to a more lucrative career
sentences.cn: 涉足更赚钱的行业的敲门砖

sentences.en: As pay goes up the country's domestic market will become more lucrative.
sentences.cn: 随着工资上涨中国国内市场也会繁荣起来.

sentences.en: Farmers abandoned the land for more lucrative exployment in the booming construction industry.
sentences.cn: 农民们抛弃了土地,到发达的建筑业中去找更能赚钱的职业.

sentences.en: He decided to turn his hobby into a lucrative sideline.
sentences.cn: 他决定把自己的爱好变成赚钱的副业.

sentences.en: He has forfeited a lucrative fee but feels his well-being is more important.
sentences.cn: 他主动放弃了可观的酬金，觉得自己的健康更加重要。

sentences.en: He is often tempted to find steadier, more lucrative work.
sentences.cn: 他经常想找到较稳定, 更赚钱的工作.

sentences.en: I think she showed great strength of character in turning down what must have been a very lucrative offer.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝了那个绝对诱人的提议，我认为这显示出了她性格中非凡的意志力。

sentences.en: Now who's these king of these rude ludicrous lucrative lyrics.
sentences.cn: 谁是这些滑稽但又有经济效益的歌词的王者?

sentences.en: She has a lucrative business selling leather goods.
sentences.cn: 她做皮货生意,利润丰厚.

sentences.en: Suitable graduates still have many other, more lucrative, options.
sentences.cn: 那些合适的毕业生往往能够找到其他薪水更加高的职位.

sentences.en: The checkpoints have become so lucrative that officers buy and sell them.
sentences.cn: 官员们买卖这些检查站就是因为其有利可图.

sentences.en: The lucrative contract with television means that England's wealthy football clubs will now be laughing all the way to the bank.
sentences.cn: 与电视台签订的这项大合同会让富有的英格兰足球俱乐部财源滚滚。

sentences.en: These black models are moving in on what was previously white territory: the lucrative cosmetic contracts.
sentences.cn: 黑人模特正逐步涉足曾是白人主宰的领地：签约获利丰厚的化妆品行业。

sentences.en: Thousands of ex-army officers have found lucrative jobs in private security firms.
sentences.cn: 数以千计的退伍军官在私营保安公司找到了收入不菲的工作。

sentences.en: Your own small business on the side sounds pretty lucrative.
sentences.cn: 自己的小生意也经营地不错,营利不成问题.

words.tran_cn: [金融]有利可图的，赚钱的；合算的

trans.tran_cn: 获利多的，赚钱的，合算的
trans.tran_en: a job or activity that is lucrative lets you earn a lot of money
